meanings.definition: The bones of the fingers or toes.
meanings.sent1: I counted the phalanges on my hand.
meanings.sent2: She broke one of the phalanges in her toe.
meanings.sent3: The phalanges on the skeleton model looked funny with tiny gloves on.
meanings.sent4: His phalanges danced across the piano keys with grace.
meanings.sent5: The doctor explained how important it is to protect your phalanges during sports.

meanings.sent1: He pointed at the map with his phalanges.
meanings.sent2: She painted each of her phalanges a different color.
meanings.sent3: The kitten played with my phalanges as if they were toys.
meanings.sent4: Her phalanges tapped impatiently on the table.
meanings.sent5: The baby held onto my phalanges tightly while learning to walk.
